00046 //----------------------------------------------------------
00047 void
00048 GrRenderList::AddMeshInstRange( GrMeshInst* meshInst, unsigned int range, bool preTransformed )
00049 {
00051         const GrMaterial* material = meshInst->GetMaterial( range );
00052         if ( material == 0 )
00053                 return;
00054         
00055         _items.Push( SItem( meshInst, range, preTransformed ) );
00056 }
00057 
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 void
00060 GrRenderList::AddMeshInstRanges( GrMeshInst* meshInst, unsigned int startRange, unsigned int rangeCount, bool preTransformed )
00061 {
00063         unsigned int rangeEnd = startRange + rangeCount;
00064         for ( unsigned int i = startRange; i < rangeEnd; ++i )
00065                 AddMeshInstRange( meshInst, i, preTransformed );
00066 }
00067 
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------
00069 void
00070 GrRenderList::AddMeshInst( GrMeshInst* meshInst, bool preTransformed )
00071 {
00073         unsigned int rangeCount = meshInst->GetRangeCount();
00074         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < rangeCount; ++i )
00075                 AddMeshInstRange( meshInst, i, preTransformed );
00076 }

00099 //----------------------------------------------------------
00100 void
00101 GrRenderList::SortByState() const
00102 {
00103         _items.Sort( StateSortCmp );

00106 //----------------------------------------------------------
00107 void
00108 GrRenderList::SortByStateAndFrontToBack( const GrCamera& camera ) const
00109 {
00110         _depthSortCamera = &camera;
00111         _items.Sort( StateDepthSortCmp );
00112         _depthSortCamera = 0;
00113 }

00115 //----------------------------------------------------------
00116 void
00117 GrRenderList::GetVisibleItems( GrRenderList& visible, const GrFrustum& frustum ) const
00118 {
00119         const unsigned int objCount = _items.GetElemCount();
00120         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < objCount; ++j )
00121         {
00123                 const SItem& curItem = _items[ j ];
00124                 if ( curItem.preTransformed )
00125                 {
00126                         if ( frustum.IsAABoxInside( curItem.meshInst->GetMesh()->GetRangeAABox( curItem.range ) ) )
00127                                 visible.Add( curItem );
00128                 }
00129                 else
00130                 {
00131                         if ( frustum.IsOBoxInside( curItem.meshInst->GetRangeOBox( curItem.range ) ) )
00132                                 visible.Add( curItem );
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 }

00142         _patches.Clear();

00150 //----------------------------------------------------------
00151 int
00152 StateSortCmp( const GrRenderList::SItem& left, const GrRenderList::SItem& right )
00153 {
00155         const GrMaterial* leftMat = left.meshInst->GetMaterial( left.range );
00156         const GrMaterial* rightMat = right.meshInst->GetMaterial( right.range );
00157         B_ASSERT( leftMat != 0 && rightMat != 0 );
00158 
00160         if ( leftMat->GetSortType() != rightMat->GetSortType() )
00161                 return leftMat->GetSortType() < rightMat->GetSortType();
00162 
00165         if ( leftMat == rightMat )
00166                 return left.preTransformed > left.preTransformed;
00167 
00169         return ( size_t )leftMat < ( size_t )rightMat;
00170 }
00171 
00172 //----------------------------------------------------------
00173 int
00174 StateDepthSortCmp( const GrRenderList::SItem& left, const GrRenderList::SItem& right )
00175 {
00177         B_ASSERT( _depthSortCamera != 0 );
00178 
00180         const GrMaterial* leftMat = left.meshInst->GetMaterial( left.range );
00181         const GrMaterial* rightMat = right.meshInst->GetMaterial( right.range );
00182         B_ASSERT( leftMat != 0 && rightMat != 0 );
00183 
00185         if ( leftMat->GetSortType() != rightMat->GetSortType() )
00186                 return leftMat->GetSortType() < rightMat->GetSortType();
00187 
00189         if ( leftMat == rightMat )
00190         {
00193                 if ( left.preTransformed == left.preTransformed )
00194                 {
00195                         float distSqr1 = _depthSortCamera->GetPos().DistSqr( left.meshInst->GetTransform().GetTranslate() );
00196                         float distSqr2 = _depthSortCamera->GetPos().DistSqr( right.meshInst->GetTransform().GetTranslate() );
00197                         return ( distSqr1 < distSqr2 );
00198                 }
00199                 else
00200                         return left.preTransformed > left.preTransformed;
00201         }
00202 
00204         return ( size_t )leftMat < ( size_t )rightMat;
00205 }
